Title: U.S. FDA says malaria drugs in shortage as coronavirus drives up demand - Reuters India
Description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration said malaria drugs hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine are in shortage due to a surge in demand because of the coronavirus pandemic.

Title: Kerala has best coronavirus test rate in country, but is that enough? - The Indian Express
Description: Despite having a clear edge over other states in terms of testing rate, doctors and experts in Kerala, wary over the extent of possible community spread in the state, are asking the government to avoid being complacent at this juncture.

Title: Israel tests coronavirus vaccine prototype on rodents at defence lab - India Today
Description: A source familiar with IIBR activities told Reuters that trials were already under way on rodents. The source declined to identify the kind of rodent.

Title: Coronavirus droplets could travel up to 27 feet, claims MIT scientist - India TV News
Description: According to the MIT researcher, 'owing to the forward momentum of the cloud, pathogen-bearing droplets are propelled much farther than if they were emitted in isolation without a turbulent puff cloud trapping and carrying them forward'.

Title: Coronavirus: Should you wear mask in public if not sick? - India Today
Description: There is "no specific evidence to suggest that the wearing of masks by the mass population has any particular benefit", the WHO's epidemics chief said this week. "In fact, thereâ€™s some evidence to suggest the opposite."

Title: HIV drugs junked: Malaria drug, antibiotic combo now on treatment list - The Indian Express
Description: Earlier this month, India had also recommended use of HCQ as a prophylactic in medical workers managing coronavirus patients and caregivers at home, leading to a huge surge in demand.
